m_displayName: WEAPON - ENIRIPSA - SCALPEL DE L APOSTRUKER - Puissance Apostruker

description.fr: Lorsqu'un de vos personnages {%Attack} Il inflige {value:dmg,percent} de sa {%PV} aux adversaires autour <sprite name="cell_around"> de lui et soigne de {value:heal,percent} de sa {%PV} les alliés autour <sprite name="cell_around"> de lui.
description.en: When one of your characters ATTACKS: They inflict {value:dmg,percent} of their {%PV} on surrounding opponents and heal surrounding allies {value:heal,percent} of their {%PV}.
description.es: Cuando uno de tus personajes inflige un {%Attack} Inflige un {value:dmg,percent} de su {%PV} a los adversarios a su alrededor <sprite name="cell_around"> y cura un {value:heal,percent} de su {%PV} a los aliados a su alrededor <sprite name="cell_around">.
description.de: Wenn einer deiner Charaktere Ziel eines {%Attack,plural:many} wird: Er verursacht bei Gegnern im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> {value:dmg,percent} seiner {%PV} als Schaden und heilt Verbündete im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> um {value:heal,percent} seiner {%PV}.
description.pt: Quando um dos seus personagens efetua um {%Attack} Ele inflige {value:dmg,percent} de sua {%PV} aos adversários em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele e cura em {value:heal,percent} de sua {%PV} os aliados em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele.
